name: Crafty â—¦ Your Writing Assistant
description:
Crafty is a Figma plugin which helps you create better UX copies for your designs in just 2 steps:


Enter your input sentence -> Choose a style (friendly, formal, playful)


Then just let Crafty do its magic and generate different style variants!


Note: We are currently in limited beta. Sign up here for early access, or join our Discord.
